attributes.action: keep non-photographic visual depictions of underaged characters engaged in sexual activity legal, as long as no actual child was involved or harmed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All images of child sexual abuse, including drawings and computer-generated images of child abuse will be illegal if new proposals go through. This includes simple drawings which  harm no actual child. This would mean that if a child in Primary School drew a sexual act for fun, it would be a criminal offense.

Drawn images which in no way harm children could provide a release for pedophiles. Taking away this release could drive them to getting REAL child pornography which harms children, or drive them to molestation.
